summary: DOOR CHECK ARM BUSHINGS ARE BAD ON 2000 ISUZU RODEL AND 2000 HONDA PASSPORT.  SON HAD TO REPLACE BUSHINGS ON THE 2000 HONDA PASSPORT AT ABOUT 12K ( ALL DOORS).  I RECENTLY PURCHASED ISUZU RODEO WITH 32K AND DOOR BUSHINGS WERE BAD.  SINCE IT WAS OUTSIDE THE 3 YR PERIOD OF THE  WARRANTY HAD  TO PAY FOR REPAIR.*AK
